name: Why don't you dice? | GMTK Jam 2022
name_original: Why don't you dice? | GMTK Jam 2022
description:
"Why don't you dice?" is a game about a minigame, made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

Controls: Arrows, A and D (Left and Right on minigame) and Space bar or E to advance screens.

Tired of being toss around everytime, our little angry D20 decides it's time to take part in the game. After each human player throw, it will start to mess with one's luck through a minigame of skill and hope for the lowest number possible to be rolled.

Let's roll!
